itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest musician and creator of the Drinkin’ Broettes intro song Birdsall to discuss the pressing topic of circumcisions, talk about Jerry Springer’s drunken sexual backstage experience, why dumping out and relationships don’t go together, and Birdsall talks about his latest release “Selfish” dropping this Friday.

 

https://orcd.co/selfish
